channel.title: Npc teleport?
channel.description:
Im useing a 508.
im wondering how do i make an npc that will teleport you when you kill it.
and if you can i wanna ask how i make it teleport you after you talk to it(diaolog)
Maybe you can make a tut on it and get some rep++
Thank you.
